 *Submitted for verification at Etherscan.io on 2021-02-07
 */

/*

                            ===------------------------------------------==                         
                          ===--------------------------------------------=                          
                         ==------------===------------------------------=-                          
                        ==-------------======--------------------------==                           
                       -=------------------====--------==------------==-                            
     --                ==--------------------===------==---------====-                              
     =====----     ----==----------------------========---------==@=                                
     -=---=============-==----------------------======--------====-                                 
      -==----------------=====-------------------====--------====                                   
        -=======--======--   ---===-------------====-------====-                                    
            ----------            -=----------======------====-                                     
                                 --=--------========------====                                      
                                ==-------======-  -=------====                                      
                         -      =-------=====-     =------====                                      
                     -======-   -==-----======-    =------====                                      
                   ===========-   ==-----=======-- -=-----====--                                    
                 -======VB======   -==----=-======= ==----=======                                   
                 -=============-    --============-  ============                                   


Doges are running through the crypto streets leaving steaming piles in wallets everywhere. But PooperScooper is here to clean up. SCOOP combines the tokenomics of all the greatest moon coins (RFI, SAFEMOON, ROCKETBUNNY, SHIB, HOKK) with the added bonus of NFTs and an airdrop to all holders of rugged dog coins; plus a secret way to get back at the ruggers. 

As a SCOOP holder you earn passive income that is deposited automatically into your wallet through frictionless yield. No need to stake. And there's a bonus to PooperScooperTroopers (the elite LP providers).

PooperScooper is deflationary, has compounding yield, and a price plunge protection.

SCOOP begins with a supply of 1 Quadrillion. A portion of each transaction is "scooped" and redistributed. 4% split: 2% to liquidity providers, 1% locked into liquidity, and 1% into the PooHole (never to be seen again). In addition, there will be a three-stage burn taking place where a trifecta of significant bags of SCOOP will be dropped on the doorsteps of major ruggers to burn eternally (unsellable and non-transferable) so that they can watch the value rise and never be able to claim it. 

Supply exponentially decreases with increasing transactions, resulting in greater and greater scarcity of available SCOOP and a rising price floor, thereby further protecting Scoopers from loss.

Are you tired of seeing crap every time you open your wallet? SCOOP it. And throw some back at the bad guys.

tg: scoopcoin
web: scoopme.xyz
twitter: scoopcoin 

- Deflationary
- Frictionless rewards
- 2x for LPs
- Rising Floor
- Large holder plunge protection

SHIB AKITA HOKK KISHU HACHIKO DANE DOBE SHIH TORA JSHIBA BIBA BNGL DOGEN TOSA POGE PUP CHI PUGE COVINU MOONDOGE HODOR ELON SCOOBY MUSKY BOKK INU SHEP LABRA ROGE BBD JINU MALLY SANSHU PUG CYBERD UDOGE RKYU HNZO KOCHI USKITA SHIBAKEN CHIBA KEANU

*/

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

pragma solidity >=0.7.0 <0.8.0;

contract ThePooHole {
    function whatHeap() public pure returns (string memory) {
        return "THE TURDS BE PILIN, BUT IM SMILIN";
    }
}
